<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77033</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4947f98a-7436-49e1-8a2a-d88697bc14be#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Genetikai kód</string>
            <string language="en">Genetic code</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genetischer Code</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Code génétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Código genetic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Codice genetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γενετικός κώδικας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Código genético</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A négyféle elemből álló genetikai kódnak legalább háromtagúnak kell lennie a húszféle aminosav kódolásához</string>
            <string language="en">Genetic code consisting four kind of elements has to have at least three members for coding the twenty kind of amino-acids</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">felépítés,  felépítő folyamat,  genetikai kód,  DNS,  </string>
            <string language="en">build, building process, genetic code, DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestehende Art vier des genetischen Codes der 
Elemente muß mindestens drei Bauteile für das Codieren der Art 
Zwanzig der Aminosäuren haben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le genre quatre consistant de code génétique 
d'éléments doit avoir au moins trois membres pour coder le genre 
vingt d'acides aminés</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O tipo quatro consistindo do código genetic dos 
elementos tem que ter ao menos três membros para codificar o tipo 
vinte dos amino-acids</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il genere stante costituito quattro di codice 
genetico di elementi deve avere almeno tre membri per la codifica del 
genere venti di amminoacidi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το γενετικό αποτελούμενο είδος τέσσερα κώδικα 
στοιχείων πρέπει να έχει τουλάχιστον τρία μέλη για την 
κωδικοποίηση του είδους είκοσι amino-acids</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La clase compuesto cuatro del código genético 
de elementos tiene que tener por lo menos tres miembros para cifrar la
clase veinte de aminoácidos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bau, aufbauender Prozeß, genetischer Code, DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">construction, processus de construction, code 
génétique, ADN</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">configuração, processo construindo, código genetic, 
DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">configurazione, processo di costruzione, codice 
genetico, DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χτίστε, χτίζοντας τη διαδικασία, γενετικός κώδικας, DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estructura, proceso constructivo, código genético, 
DNA</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
